meanings.definition: To praise excessively or too much.
meanings.sent1: She always overpraises her cat, calling him the best in the world.
meanings.sent2: He overpraises his own work, thinking it's better than everyone else's.
meanings.sent3: The teacher overpraises the student's drawing, saying it's a masterpiece when it's just a stick figure.
meanings.sent4: The politician overpraises his opponent to gain favor with the public.
meanings.sent5: The coach overpraises the team's effort, even though they lost the game.
